title: Item Sets Not Working
body:
Whenever I try and use Item sets, I can't drag any of the items into the boxes that I create. I'm using a Mac and so far haven't been able to edit or create new item sets.

Can someone please tell me if I'm doing something wrong or if there is a current bug right now?

replies.body:
This is a current bug right now that occurs on macs running macOS 10.12 Sierra. The only workaround at the moment is to edit/create your item sets on another computer that *isn't running* macOS Sierra. You'll be able to see the changes on your mac, since item sets are saved to the server.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Will there be a patch or something to fix this bug?

I found where item sets are stored: /Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LoL/Config/ItemSets.json.

You can edit this file which is JSON format. If you have a developer background it will be easy for you.
If not you can copy and paste the content here: http://jsonprettyprint.com/
It will make the content more readable, then you could be able to understand the structure of the file by copying an existing item set you already have created before.

GLHF

And I continue the flood.
There is a Chrome extension to grab item sets from several services (Mobafire, Champions.gg, ...): https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/leaguesets/eoekgdlembbelehimiljbdnofnldepmc/related

The reddit post (at the end): https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/comments/58z835/3rd_party_itemset_creator/
I think our only hope of a fix will be the release of the new client. They won't fix the old client for a small subset of players...
